Articles.Content:
This is the release thread for my Indian Space Research Organization probe and spacecraft replicas made by Duna Aerospace.

These crafts use Tweakscale and Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

ISRO Orbital Vehicle

India's first manned spacecraft, launched on a GSLV Mk2

93 parts, costs 232,474

[http://kerbalx.com/clivman/ISRO-Orbital-Vehicle](http://kerbalx.com/clivman/ISRO-Orbital-Vehicle)

> 
> ![11E90080A939A3709FD26D0BDDA6054BCAD40DD0](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1457265578247845055/11E90080A939A3709FD26D0BDDA6054BCAD40DD0/)
> 
> 

Chandrayaan 1 

ISRO's first mission to the moon launched on a PSLV XL.

 75 parts, costs 46,660

[http://kerbalx.com/clivman/Chandrayaan-1](http://kerbalx.com/clivman/Chandrayaan-1)

> 
> ![F90186FE27572ADCF4D30955E03E742CEC9EB3D5](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/436073278209696387/F90186FE27572ADCF4D30955E03E742CEC9EB3D5/)
> 
> 

Mangalyaan 1

 ISRO's first mission to Mars launched on a PSLV XL.

 76 parts, costs 61,179

[http://kerbalx.com/clivman/Mangalyaan-1](http://kerbalx.com/clivman/Mangalyaan-1)

> 
> ![B77F641EC7F2491542C317A12E5167F7A56FD488](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/436073278209718501/B77F641EC7F2491542C317A12E5167F7A56FD488/)
> 
> 

Launchers

> 
> PSLV XL
> 
> ![44F37300D6C94233CDC60A7C37543294D38BF1AD](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/436073278209715105/44F37300D6C94233CDC60A7C37543294D38BF1AD/)
> 
>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-17T03:49:53Z" title="08/17/2015 03:49  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 17, 2015</time> by clivman**
The ISRO orbital vehicle has been released.
ISRO orbital Vehicle is actually on GSLV Mk-III not Mk-II.
